metadata.name: Suspicious Windows Update Agent Empty Cmdline
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious Windows Update Agent activity in which a wuauclt.exe process command line doesn't contain any command line flags

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wuauclt.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wuauclt.exe') AND (endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wuauclt')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wuauclt.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious Windows Update Agent activity in which a wuauclt.exe process command line doesn't contain any command line flags
